feature_model.name: root
feature_model.feature_tree: :r root (root) :o F4 (F4) :o F1 (F1) :o F6 (F6) :o F8 (F8) :o F10 (F10) :o F9 (F9) :o F2 (F2) :o F5 (F5) :o F7 (F7) :o F3 (F3)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~F9 or F7 constraint_2:~F1 or F3 constraint_3:~F2 or F7 constraint_4:~F9 or ~F2
